about.title: About LEVELTHREE
about.subtitle: Pioneering Web/App & AI Security
about.p1: LEVELTHREE is a specialized Web/App & AI Security company providing innovative solutions for the AI era. We maximize business value through the latest tech stacks and creative approaches.
about.p2: We create digital solutions that innovate user experience and drive business growth, not just simple websites. We specialize in AI platform & service development, APM, macro detection/prevention solutions, and various enterprise solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Providing innovative web/app & security solutions for the AI era

ai.title: AI Platform & Service
ai.description: Specialized web/app development service for AI-based platforms. We build interactive and intelligent user experiences utilizing the latest AI technologies.

security.title: Security & APM
security.description: Security solutions focused on macro/bot detection and real-time threat defense. Protecting web applications with behavioral analysis and Fraud Detection.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Solutions
enterprise.description: Providing customized solutions for digital transformation. We develop scalable and stable enterprise-grade applications.
